website_summaries.verdict: Let your inner unicorn loose with this Unicorn Snot!
pros: Simply rub onto your hair, face, or body and allow the glittery gel to dry
It turns clear and only leaves glitter
Cosmetic-grade glitter is safe and gentle on your skin

customer_reviews.title: LOVE It!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a huge fan of wearing glitter when I wear an outfit that shows my shoulders and back. I ran out and needed to find something and this one popped up. I will admit that the reason I bought it was solely based on the name. I mean Unicorn Snot? How funny is that? I absolutely love this product! I love the fact that the shimmer is very subtle (I'm not into looking as though I rolled around in the stuff) and it lasts a long time. In fact, I've woken up the next morning and there was still some on me. I would definitely recommend this product to anyone who fancies a nice, subtle shimmer.
customer_reviews.author: Just Jennie

customer_reviews.title: After I bought this I found out glitter is the ...
customer_reviews.text: After I bought this I found out glitter is the most polluting substance as it is so small it falls through filtration. BUMMER
customer_reviews.author: sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Body Glitter
customer_reviews.text: I received the purple Unicorn Snot and I must say that I like it very much. I did however notice a big difference in the purple compared to the pink and gold. I received the pink and gold snot a couple of weeks ago and the gel is really tacky and applies in clumps rather than being able to easily spread on my skin as the purple is. It feels like the gel in the gold and pink is somewhat dry. I love the colors but like I said I really want to be able to spread it evenly on my skin but am unable to do so with the gold and the pink.
customer_reviews.author: Lil' Bit

customer_reviews.title: Perfect amount of sparkle!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great for everything. A light coat is good for just a hint of sparkle on your eyelids, or you can add more layers to really shine! Perfect for festivals and competitions! I have used this on 12 girls for a cheer competition and they SPARKLED! We had lots left too. I also used it for my daughters fairy costume and she looked great. So many compliments. LOVE UNICORN SNOT!!
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I love it! I got silver, I feel like other colors would be hard to identify, silver is just glittery. Does not dry sticky, stays on really well. Actually hard to remove, which is perfect since I'm using this for Lost Lands and I'm probably going to be sweaty. The best way I found to remove it is to just take a dry rag and wipe, falls right off. If you use water/wet wipe it doesn't come off at all. EDIT I used this product the entire weekend at LL, it worked amazingly! It was ungodly hot but this stayed on through sweat and water.
customer_reviews.author: Delaney

customer_reviews.title: So great !!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff so much, I put it on my eyelids mostly. Something that's really cool is, I was able to apply giltter directly on the "snot" and the glitter stuck great! So basically I used it as glitter glue on my eyes and LOVED it!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: dally

customer_reviews.title: Worked ok.
customer_reviews.text: It’s fine if you don’t need to wear any make up under it. Kinda slimey but it is snot so 🤷🏼‍♀️Dry glitter worked better for all over coverage that didn’t mess up the makeup.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi Masher

customer_reviews.title: Holo Glitter = Love
customer_reviews.text: So cute! Got this for a music festival and it’s awesome. It doesn’t dry sticky (at least it didn’t for me and i used a thin layer) and the smell isn’t super strong or glue smelling. It smells like unscented hairgel mixed with a hint of slime lol. If you are looking for some FULL coverage glitter though you might have to build this up or add some chunky glitter to it. It has a very thin texture almost like hand sanitizer. Doesn’t dry shiny, I love it :)
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this glitter. We used it as part of a Poppy costume. It's is difficult to see in photos, but it provides just the right amount of sparkle and dries quickly. I also let my daughter put on just the tiniest bit for her gymnastics meet. You can layer it if you want more pronounced glitter.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: I was doing face painting at a local fair, and I brought some Unicorn Snot along. The tub contains a substantial amount, which was a hit among the 100+ kids I worked with that day. The sparkles weren't as noticeable on my blond hair as it was on the kids with brown or black hair, but it did show up on my skin fairly well. I love that it's vegan and would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah M

customer_reviews.title: Glitter go to
customer_reviews.text: So I have been searching for the glitter grail, this might be it. I sweat a lot so having glitter stay on me all day, let alone night- is quite the feat. Unicorn stays on for. Whole Coachella day plus night. This sweaty girl approves and would recommend if you have an all day affair or just want to zhzouz your look of the day (:
customer_reviews.author: Forever Filipina

customer_reviews.title: Both my girls have enjoyed this. Wouldn’t use on the hair like some ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because if the name. I gave it to my 9 year old for Christmas. Both my girls have enjoyed this. Wouldn’t use on the hair like some reviews have stated, it was too slimy when tried. I bought the Silver color. Nice product and would recommend to others. A lot of glitter!
customer_reviews.author: Warm in Florida

customer_reviews.title: Perfect amount of glitter
customer_reviews.text: I love this glitter. I apply it almost like a highlighter on my face. It works so well. The glitter is definitely noticeable but also subtle enough to not be obnoxious. I was worried, since it's sort of a gel, that the glitter would be really unnoticeable but it's not. It's honestly perfect. 10/10 would highly recommend. I want to buy all the other colors now. Though to be honest it doesn't come out super pink. Especially if you have dark skin I doubt the color would show up much. You'd still have sparkles though!
customer_reviews.author: Curran

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for me and my children to use when we sparkle. its also a cute novelty type item. love the name. i have gotten quite a few comments about its name, people keep saying gross when they see the name which is funny to me lol. as for the product, it works great. it does leave a grainy type texture when it is used at times but that is to be expected with the glitter. when this runs out I will be buying some more. definitely. Me and my kids love it so much.
customer_reviews.author: Lotus420

customer_reviews.title: Perfect glitter, small glitter that goes on easy.
customer_reviews.text: I loved this glitter as it has small pieces of glitter and stays on your skin for a long time. I like that it a hint of glitter without the big flakes. You can make it more intense by just adding more glitter or just a hint. I will buy more when I run out.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy W. Stein

customer_reviews.title: GLITTER!! Need I say more!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this stuff! I've ordered several jars and I wear this almost everyday. Just open the jar and dab in on (or lotion up in it for that matter). The glitter/sparkle lasts all day and when you are ready to take it off, just wipe it off with a damp cloth. It's super easy to use and there is no scent; JUST SPARKLE. Love this product! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: T. Bolding

customer_reviews.title: and it looked awesome. The picture doesn’t do it justice
customer_reviews.text: I used this in my friend’s and nieces’ hair for the 4th of July, and it looked awesome. The picture doesn’t do it justice. Though it did take a few washes to get it all out, but that’s ok! I also used it as the base to hold the glitter and stars on her face.
customer_reviews.author: B. Malkuch

customer_reviews.title: My Go to glitter gel
customer_reviews.text: It's biodegradable, vegan, and cruelty free? Looking good was never so easy. I use this glitter as a bas to get chunky glitters to stick. Plus they sent me a free trial size of their glitter sunscreen which is gonna come in handy this weekend for EDC. if i like it's I'll purchase a regular sized tube.
customer_reviews.author: Aileen

customer_reviews.title: Fun and Long-Lasting
customer_reviews.text: Love this body glitter and get a ton of compliments. It stays on very well (almost too well), so make sure you take a good shower after going out or your bedsheets will be covered in glitter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I have every color
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I have every shade and wear it to work every day! Compliments ALL day, and I'm always recommending it. Super easy to remove, I use a moisturizing cream and it comes right off. A little goes a long way so product lasts forever, worth it
customer_reviews.author: Shop A Holic

customer_reviews.title: Arrived shattered
customer_reviews.text: Arrived completely shattered, but I couldn't see that was the case until I took the plastic wrapping off and it all fell apart and a piece of glass cut my foot. I'd rather not rub shards of glass on my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Kel

customer_reviews.title: Good glitter base
customer_reviews.text: The glitter didn’t show up super well, but it was a great base to add more glitter on top. It didn’t come broken for me & the smell doesn’t bug me. If you want to be super glittery, I recommend using this as a base and adding more glitter on top
customer_reviews.author: EH

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is so good!!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is so good!!! I did my hair in a bun for a space-themed dance, and smeared on TONS of this to control my fly-away heavy hair. It kept everything in place without looking caked or gluey, and the shimmer was beautiful! My little brother, who hates haircuts, also uses it to keep his bangs out of his eyes-- works like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: she glittered like Tinkerbell! Washed off easily as well
customer_reviews.text: Unicorn snot was exactly what we were looking for! Worked amazingly well in my daughters hair and on her skin...she glittered like Tinkerbell! Washed off easily as well! Five stars!!! It was a huge hit with my kids...anything containing the word "snot" ;)
customer_reviews.author: homeschoolbythebeach

customer_reviews.title: ... most between the yellow and silver but both were amazing i mixed them put it all over my legs ...
customer_reviews.text: I used this one the most between the yellow and silver but both were amazing i mixed them put it all over my legs and chest and back it made my skin look amazing omg !
customer_reviews.author: Gilmarlee

customer_reviews.title: Jar half empty
customer_reviews.text: Okay so glitter wise its good and you cant really see the color but the glitter itself is pink. (I got the pink one) however it smells like cheap slime for kids and the jar is only half full. Its a bit disappointing. But its pretty
customer_reviews.author: Samantha bellinghausen

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because of the reviews and the name of the product. I love glitter, so I bought this. I bought brushes from Dollar Tree to apply it. You don't need much on the brush to cover an area. I love it and will reorder it! It doesn't smell which is good!
customer_reviews.author: Connor

customer_reviews.title: Don’t hesitate! Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend! Lots of glitter and works like a gel in hair. Bought this for my girls’ dance recital instead of the spray and they loved it! Used for almost a whole week on 3 kids and have enough left for 2 or 3 more recitals. So worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Frank T 3

customer_reviews.title: The only body glitter I will ever use
customer_reviews.text: This is my absolute favorite body glitter! I cannot recommend this highly enough, and all their other products. Not only does it feel lovely but the glitter is just enough without being too much,
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin Donohoe

customer_reviews.title: Fun and Inventive
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my granddaughter for Christmas! Being eight years old, she loved it! Now that she’s nine and in the summer, it’s still a hit. It looks sparkly on the sides of her face and going into her hair. It washes off easily. The name is clever so it adds to the fun! Good for slumber parties!
customer_reviews.author: Nana Rocks!

customer_reviews.title: This is great body glitter
customer_reviews.text: This is great body glitter. Isn't sticky. Becomes friends with it because once you put it on it will never ever completely come off. I'm still finding it on me after weeks of showering....
customer_reviews.author: mountain wanderer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect body glitter!
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect body glitter for the Backstreet Boys concert I went to! Bringing back the millennium! Even thought dancing, hugging, sweating, etc., it stayed on all night!
customer_reviews.author: Julia Bledsoe

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is awesome! It goes on in a gel that dries ...
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is awesome! It goes on in a gel that dries really quick. The glitter sticks to your skin well and you're not left with a yucky feeling from the gel. Most of the glitter stayed put too until I took a shower. Just used a sponge and shower gel to wash and it came right off.
customer_reviews.author: Christy Arnhart

customer_reviews.title: Unicorn Snot
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter thought it was the most awesome gift. Now the twins both want some. The oldest said she really likes it. She thanked me over and over.
customer_reviews.author: Polly Griggs

customer_reviews.title: A little goes a long way
customer_reviews.text: This will last a long time and you don’t need to use a lot. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: KKCMAX

customer_reviews.title: Perfect princess sparkle
customer_reviews.text: Used this in my daughters hair everyday we went to Disney Parks... she loved having the glittery hairstyles to go with her princess gowns!
customer_reviews.author: J.S. H.

customer_reviews.title: Love this a MUST buy!!! ❤️
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing! Exactly what I was looking for. I bought the silver color. The glitter stayed on all day until I took my shower. You don’t even know your wearing until you look at yourself and say oh yeah I’m sparkly. Love this product a must buy!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Fun color Went with all haircolors
customer_reviews.text: We use unicorn snot for an event we had to put through the braids or down the part-It stayed on while the kids played- Wish it came with an applicator though
customer_reviews.author: sheri marie abner

customer_reviews.title: Preteen daughter loved it
customer_reviews.text: She thought the name was hilarious. Stayed on the skin but didn't spread glitter everywhere in the house
customer_reviews.author: Amy Saxton

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and versatile, but subtle.
customer_reviews.text: I use it for raving. It’s cool to just throw on if you either don’t have time for body jewels or chunky glitter or if you want to add a shimmer to the whole look on top of the others but it’s by no means shiny enough to be attention drawing if that makes sense. But for sure comfortable not sticky and I just shower and it comes off. Handy to throw on your date too if they’re not down for big glitter hah.
customer_reviews.author: Shandra Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Get a tetanus shot before you buy it
customer_reviews.text: I have never written a review in my life but oh my I was quite upset receiving this item. Not only was it already shattered when I opened it, it broke into MORE pieces once I picked it up to throw it away and sliced me open. Was the delivery man throwing this package from his truck moving at 90 mph or is this glass paper thin? Who knows, alls I know is my hand was cut open and now I have glitter everywhere 10/10 would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff! It dries nicely on your skin and isn’t itchy at all. It comes off easily with a makeup wipe. I gave it 4 stars instead of 5 because it doesn’t go over makeup like foundation very well without rubbing it around and messing it up.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Coons

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Halloween
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, clean, and remove. It looks really cute on and I use it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Garcia-Earlewine

customer_reviews.title: Good for laughs
customer_reviews.text: This is just like any standard body glitter, but comes in a heavy duty glass container which I didn't expect. When my daughter pulled it out of her bag (part of a birthday gift) she burst into a fit of laughter. It was great.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Loved it
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this by accident and was going to return but I accidentally dropped it and it broke so I gave it a chance and I absolutely loved it ❤️
customer_reviews.author: AdiLewis

customer_reviews.title: Cute body glitter!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for a little girl and she loved it! Super cute body glitter!
customer_reviews.author: Brenna

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is amazing! I put a swipe of it in my ...
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing! I put a swipe of it in my hair, to add some flair, and immediately got 4 compliments just walking through the grocery store. People laughed really hard when I told them it was called "Unicorn Snot" too. It stands out really well!
customer_reviews.author: Jenea Huston

customer_reviews.title: so good for festivals!
customer_reviews.text: I love using this because chunky glitters can be a pain to get off. And this glitter gel is perfect for people that don't want to be too flashy but still want to be glittery. I used this at Electric Forest and it was super hot and I was sweating all day, but I noticed this stuff really stayed on! I love this stuff! Totally reccommend
customer_reviews.author: Myla Zimmer

customer_reviews.title: Check Package
customer_reviews.text: The product was broken and glitter every where. I’m glad I opened the box before I wrapped it.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Fields

customer_reviews.title: SPARKLES ABOUND!
customer_reviews.text: This gel absorbs and leaves behind a lovely glittery shimmer. I put it on my arms, face, and hair. Lovely stuff. Next I'm going to buy the sunscreen version. Yes, this exists.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline C.

customer_reviews.title: Best Sparkly Snot
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for Halloween and kid-friendly. It lasted a whole day at school and came off easily with soap and a washcloth.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Glenn

customer_reviews.title: Love the product for the sparkle but It was not ...
customer_reviews.text: Love the product for the sparkle but It was not PURPLE as advertised. It was pink gel with sparkles. I was expecting a PURPLE gel with sparkle. The package did say purple, was it mislabeled?? I've used nit and I see no PURPLE.
customer_reviews.author: Schelia Evans

customer_reviews.title: great novity gift
customer_reviews.text: love the idea its body lotion but called snot bought this for my teen grand daughter
customer_reviews.author: t

customer_reviews.title: It’s pretty cuz it’s not too dense with glitter
customer_reviews.text: It’s pretty cuz it’s not too dense with glitter. Dried well with no odor would prob have to layer it for a thicker look
customer_reviews.author: Joelle L

customer_reviews.title: Fun, safe, girls love it!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this stuff. I discovered it in a store in Beverly Hills and decided to order it online (same price). It’s fun and safe!
customer_reviews.author: Smiley

customer_reviews.title: Great glimmer gel to add to your skin for any occasion!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product...easy to apply, doesn't come off on clothes and adds a little bling to your skin for any occasion! Super fun
customer_reviews.author: Jane Taylor Schell

customer_reviews.title: These are solid.
customer_reviews.text: Bought three of these as stocking stuffers for the girls, and all were happy with their gifts.
customer_reviews.author: M HUBER

customer_reviews.title: Rim of jar was shattered when my daughter opened!
customer_reviews.text: Rim of jar was shattered when my daughter opened! Thankfully she wasn’t hurt but i sliced my hand cleaning up the mess
customer_reviews.author: klud

customer_reviews.title: So sparkly!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this product. It's important to be gentile with application if you just want a little sparkle. Will last a life time!
customer_reviews.author: Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Great glitter gel
customer_reviews.text: I use this in my face painting business and the kids think it is pretty cool. I plan on buying other colors.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne Hajnal

customer_reviews.title: I bought it because the name makes me laugh
customer_reviews.text: This could be any glitter gel, but the name is hilarious, so it’s the one I chose. 😄
customer_reviews.author: Holly Mae

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Great product it just smell a little bit too much like alcohol or something
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this product. We used it for her dance recital. We even put it in her hair and everything washed out in the shower
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter. It's very goopy. Glitter sticks to your hands and not your hair
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: The glitter is very small and not concentrated.
customer_reviews.text: I like the name Unicorn Snot and the packaging is great. It makes for a fun gift. The glitter is very subtle and there is not a lot of it.. You have to look to see it.
customer_reviews.author: rabbit rabbit

customer_reviews.title: Waste of Money
customer_reviews.text: Don’t bother! The glitter comes off fast. Waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Margo Thomsen

customer_reviews.title: The girls LOVED this stuff
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and her Dance Teammates all needed Unicorn Snot for their competition rehearsal, yesterday. The girls LOVED this stuff. I think they would have slathered their entire bodies with it, but we limited it to their hairline part and over the top of their eyeshadow. They all looked so SHINY!!! We'll obviously be ordering more this Dance season.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Salyers

customer_reviews.title: perfect for festivals
customer_reviews.text: used this to get loose glitter to stick to my chest for some disco boobs i did at a festival. a+ held up all day even through sweating
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to apply, looks great, doesn’t feel like you’re wearing anything. And it didn’t irritate my sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Margeaux

customer_reviews.title: Magical snot
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 6 year old daughter’s Halloween faerie costume. She loved and it worked great. On skin or in hair it sparkles like stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Not so sparkling I use it as a glue base for heavy sparkles
customer_reviews.author: Chayaterebeloo

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this!!! A little goes a long way, so it’s a huge value for the price!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mandee

customer_reviews.title: It was great, worked like a charm
customer_reviews.text: We got it for my daughter’s dance recital. It was great, worked like a charm! Sparkled away!
customer_reviews.author: ms

customer_reviews.title: I like it because the glitter does not get every where
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this stuff. I like it because the glitter does not get every where. It is not really sticky when you put it on. I would recommend this for teens and people that loves body glitter.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Smooth & Seamless application Not sticky
customer_reviews.text: My second jar, first the silver now the purple. I love it so much that I wear it daily. I get teased because I'm a 55-year-old woman. People accuse me of being a bit juvenile. I don't care because I look so kool!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Mines

customer_reviews.title: Easily washed off and not sticky after
customer_reviews.text: I used this glitter for my daughters hair and body for recital. I had to put in a lot for it to be noticeable in her dark hair. However on the body it was easily seen. It washed off very easily and it didn’t transfer to her costume or the car. I’d recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: TT

customer_reviews.title: Looks awesome very little supply in the jar though
customer_reviews.text: Don't let that decent size jar for you is basically half full
customer_reviews.author: Skuibreaker

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Cute pink glitter but this stuff is cheap novelty makeup. It did not stay on long and made my skin sticky.
customer_reviews.author: Jencat

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I ran out body lava and it was out of stock for a while. I googled body lava alternatives and this was one of the products I bought. The glitters are a little too big for my taste.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: It glittered beautifully and didn't cause her to have a single rash ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has super-sensitive skin. We covered her arms and face with green unicorn snot for Halloween. It glittered beautifully and didn't cause her to have a single rash or hive. Thanks to Unicorn Snot she was a happy ice fairy.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Leis

customer_reviews.title: Best ever
customer_reviews.text: BEST GLITTER GLUE EVER MY GLITTER LASTED 16 HOURS FOR A FESTIVAL
customer_reviews.author: Ang

customer_reviews.title: Sparkly not sticky!
customer_reviews.text: It's soooooo sparkly and not sticky! I love it. The sparkles have some holographic quality which is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a dance recital and the girls loved it. When it dried it wasn’t sticky and added the perfect amount of sparkle.
customer_reviews.author: DY

customer_reviews.title: love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff, it worked so well and is really shiny and pretty easy to clean off.
customer_reviews.author: Cyn's Workshop

customer_reviews.title: Glittttter
customer_reviews.text: Super great consistency! Not smelly or sticky. Love this snot.
customer_reviews.author: lucas

customer_reviews.title: Funny and Great
customer_reviews.text: Smells great and the glitter doesn’t flake. Exactly what my 10 year old wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Marrya Canales

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: The glitter is easy to use and doesn’t make the hair “crusty” which is nice but it doesn’t show up very well in light hair.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Great even for sensitive skin!
customer_reviews.text: Very glittery and I was surprised it did not irritate my skin, as I have eczema! Didn't last as long as I had hoped though, maybe I should have applied another layer?
customer_reviews.author: SamF

customer_reviews.title: Sparkle fun
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for a dance recital. My daughter loved it. We put it in her hair and on her face. It took a few hair washings to get it all out of her hair but we finally got it out. It doesn’t have a smell. She loved it on her cheeks for a little shimmer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful sparkle
customer_reviews.text: My favorite part about about the unicorn snot is that it is vegan and cruelty free! It looks awesome on, and it only takes a minute for the gel to dry.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Love the glitter
customer_reviews.text: I'm a glitter kind of Lady. This fits me GREAT!!
customer_reviews.author: VC

customer_reviews.title: Really like this product
customer_reviews.text: Really like this product. It's not overly glittery. It's more subtle & gives your skin a more shimmery effect. Only downside it completely covers your hands. Wear gloves.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Lutz

customer_reviews.title: got this for my room mate to rub all over ...
customer_reviews.text: got this for my room mate to rub all over her boobs for a burlesque show, and I could see her boobs sparkling in the back.
customer_reviews.author: Blair Lahola

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to apply and dries quickly
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to apply and dries quickly. Also washes all really easily. I found it worked best when I applied a layer, let it dry, and then added more on top to enhance the effect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice color but barely showed
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t stick very well and barely showed. It was a nice color though.
customer_reviews.author: Lainey Selby

customer_reviews.title: So so
customer_reviews.text: I thought it would be more pigmented than it was, but still good. It’s like a slime that has glitter in it. Also good to use as a foundation to put bigger glitter chunks on
customer_reviews.author: Lonely Times

customer_reviews.title: Halloween
customer_reviews.text: Used this for my daughters halloween costumes to give them some extra princess glitter for Cinderella and Belle
customer_reviews.author: CourtneyW

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Glitter
customer_reviews.text: I love this. It goes on super easy and its beautifully sheer with a lot of sparkle. Perfect accessory to anything. I always get compliments when I wear it
customer_reviews.author: Juli

customer_reviews.title: idk what to put here
customer_reviews.text: it adds some flavor to any look and i definitely recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana Serrano

customer_reviews.title: Container arrived broken.
customer_reviews.text: The glass recipient arrived broken and I cut my finger while trying to recuperate some content needed. Bad idea to ship a glass container in an envelope, even a bubble one.
customer_reviews.author: OV

product_meta.title: Unicorn Snot Holographic Body Glitter Gel - Vegan & Cruelty Free, Perfect for Festival, Rave, Costume, Silver, 1.6oz
feature_bullets: EASY APPLICATION: Our glitter gel provides you with a hassle-free application! No primers or adhesives necessary. Simply apply our glitter gel to your face, hair, and body seamlessly
FEEL LIKE YOUR TRUE SELF: Sparkle inside and out with Unicorn Snot
LONG-LASTING: Whether you're spending your day at a festival or just wearing our glitter gel to dinner, our gel won't budge. We guarantee you'll shimmer all day and night
COSMETIC GRADE: Unicorn Snot Glitter Gel is made with cosmetic-grade glitter, so it's safe for your skin
ETHICAL: This is a vegan and cruelty-free product. We respect all animals, magical and otherwise
